sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Lessons.css"; // Подключение стилей const lessons = [ { title: "Present Simple", description: "Learn the basics of Present Simple tense and how to use it in daily conversations.", videoUrl: "https://youtu.be/dU-SXNKSets?si=Cbk6RXNNUjUL1UvE" }, { title: "Past Simple", description: "Understand the Past Simple tense and how to describe actions in the past.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Future Simple", description: "Explore Future Simple tense for discussing future events and plans.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Present Continuous", description: "Learn how to describe actions happening right now with Present Continuous tense.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Past Continuous", description: "Understand the Past Continuous tense for describing actions in progress in the past.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Future Continuous", description: "Learn how to talk about ongoing actions in the future with Future Continuous tense.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Present Perfect", description: "Master Present Perfect tense for discussing actions with relevance to the present.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Past Perfect", description: "Understand Past Perfect tense to describe actions completed before another past action.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Future Perfect", description: "Learn how to talk about actions that will be completed in the future with Future Perfect tense.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Present Perfect Continuous", description: "Master Present Perfect Continuous tense for describing actions that started in the past and continue to the present.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Past Perfect Continuous", description: "Learn how to use Past Perfect Continuous tense to talk about actions that were ongoing in the past.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Future Perfect Continuous", description: "Explore Future Perfect Continuous tense for talking about future ongoing actions.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "First Conditional", description: "Learn how to express real possibilities in the future with First Conditional.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Second Conditional", description: "Understand Second Conditional for expressing hypothetical situations.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Third Conditional", description: "Master Third Conditional for talking about imaginary past situations and their results.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Zero Conditional", description: "Learn how to use Zero Conditional for expressing facts and general truths.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Modal Verbs", description: "Explore the use of Modal Verbs to express ability, permission, advice, and possibility.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Passive Voice", description: "Understand how to use Passive Voice to shift the focus from the subject to the action.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Reported Speech", description: "Learn how to report what someone else has said using indirect speech.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Relative Clauses", description: "Master the use of relative clauses to combine sentences and give more information about a noun.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Question Forms", description: "Learn how to form different types of questions in English.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Comparatives and Superlatives", description: "Understand how to use comparatives and superlatives for making comparisons.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Articles (a, an, the)", description: "Master the use of articles in English and when to use 'a', 'an', and 'the'.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Adverbs of Frequency", description: "Learn how to use adverbs of frequency like 'always', 'never', 'often', etc.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, { title: "Conditionals in Reporting", description: "Explore how to use conditionals in reported speech.", videoUrl: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-video-id" }, ]; const Lessons = () => { return (

English Lessons

{lessons.map((lesson, index) => (

{lesson.title}

{lesson.description}

))}
); }; export default Lessons;
